frontmatter.title: The Bois Locker Room
frontmatter.description: Bois Locker Room’ controversy flared when screenshots of lewd conversations of teenage boys ranging from jokes about their private parts to planning ‘gang rapes’ went viral.

frontmatter.title: Domestic Violence during the COVID-19 Lockdown
frontmatter.description: Sudha Saxena could not understand for many years what wrong had she done, why was she beaten black and blue every now and then by her husband, whom she loved?

frontmatter.title: Corona Infodemic
frontmatter.description: Corona has become the first social media Infodemic in true sense. “Infodemic,’” refers to an overabundance of information—some accurate and some not.

frontmatter.title: Confusion over Career Choices in COVID Era
frontmatter.description: Adapt or perish, now as ever, is nature's inevitable imperative. Many years later corona virus has made us realize the significance of this quote.

frontmatter.title: Are You Undergoing Mid Career Dilemma ?
frontmatter.description: Have you ever wondered at times, “Am I in the right job? Am I missing something? And is this the right organization for me? “Is this really what I want to be doing all my life? Do you feel not that happy about the way things have gone so far?

frontmatter.title: Is Infidelity On Rise During COVID-19?
frontmatter.description: All long-term relationships have some changes over a period of time, none stays exactly the same. As couples navigate the tough times together, they grow and evolve as a person.
